title: Gluten free lemon shortbread with lemon icing
ingredients: ['Lemon shortbread', '175g gluten free flour', '1/2 teaspoon xanthan gum', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '75g sugar', '1 pinch salt', '2 teaspoons finely grated lemon zest', '115g butter, softened', 'Lemon glaze', '60g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons lemon juice, freshly squeezed']
